project_description: Lead generation toolkit with multi-platform scraping

issues.title: Target Audience Configuration System
issues.description:
Configure target audience with YAML config file containing:
- Industries: AI, Web3, blockchain, tech startups
- Roles: Founders, CEOs, Co-founders, BD heads, Product Owners, Growth Leads
- Regions: Germany, broader EU, other European countries, South Asia, Southeast Asia, China
- Platforms: LinkedIn, X, Telegram, TikTok, Instagram
- Backend loads defaults for UI filter options
test_steps: Create config/audience.yaml with all filter options
Backend loads config and exposes as API
Frontend displays all options in UI dropdowns
issues.test_results: All test steps passed. Backend API returns correct config. Frontend displays all filter options correctly.

issues.title: Data Pipeline & API Backend
issues.description:
Implement FastAPI backend with Apify integration:
- Apify API integration for multi-platform contact scraping
- Configurable search filters based on audience config
- Output schema: Name, Role, Company, Platform, Contact link, Region, Notes
- REST API endpoints: POST /scrape, GET /results, POST /export-sheet, GET /download-csv
- Google Sheets export via gspread
- Environment variables: APIFY_API_TOKEN, GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS
test_steps: Verify /results returns data in correct schema
issues.test_results: All 7 endpoints tested and passing. POST /scrape, GET /results, POST /export-sheet, GET /download-csv all working with correct schema. 20+ test cases, 100% pass rate.

issues.title: Professional Web UI Dashboard
issues.description:
Build React + Tailwind dashboard:
- React frontend with SaaS aesthetic
- Sidebar/top nav with filter panel
- Platform selector dropdown, Region/Industry/Roles multi-select
- Search query input with clear functionality
- Run Scrape button, Export to Sheet, Download CSV buttons
- Sortable results table with pagination and hover states
- Loading/progress states during scraping
- Light/dark mode toggle
test_steps: Start Vite dev server (npm run dev)
Test all filters work and send to backend
Test table sorting, pagination, export buttons
issues.test_results: All 12 test categories passed. Dashboard layout, filter panel, action buttons, results table, sorting, pagination, hover states, dark mode toggle, export/download, notifications, API integration, and end-to-end workflow all working correctly.

issues.title: Cost Estimation Tool
issues.description:
Create cost analysis tool (Python script or Jupyter):
- Estimates for Apify/scraping tools (per 1k, 10k, 50k records)
- Proxy costs (residential vs datacenter, monthly)
- API usage costs (LinkedIn, X, etc.)
- AI enrichment/parsing costs if applicable
- Output formats: CSV and Markdown tables with assumptions and sources
test_steps: Verify calculations for different volume levels
Check assumptions and sources are documented
issues.test_results: All 5 test steps passed. 4 test scenarios executed (default, AI enrichment, custom volumes, help). Cost calculations verified. CSV and Markdown outputs generated. All assumptions and sources documented.

issues.title: Complete Documentation & Setup
issues.description:
Create comprehensive documentation:
- README with complete setup instructions
- Environment variables and API keys guide
- Google Sheets setup walkthrough
- Local development setup (backend and frontend)
- Usage examples for scraping, exporting, downloading
- Cost estimation tool usage guide
test_steps: Verify all env vars work correctly
Run both backend and frontend locally
issues.test_results: All 5 test steps passed. 3,027 lines of comprehensive documentation created. All API endpoints documented. Complete setup guide provided. Cost estimation guide included. Environment variables documented. Troubleshooting included.

meta_issue.title: [META] Project Progress Tracker
meta_issue.description: Session tracking and project handoff information

sessions.notes: Project setup complete. All 5 feature issues created in Linear. Ready for implementation.
